cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)

# Project name and version
project(STBLib VERSION 1.0)

# Add the header files for STB
set(STB_HEADERS
    stb/stb_image.h
    stb/stb_image_write.h
    stb/stb_image_resize.h
    stb/stb_rect_pack.h
    stb/stb_truetype.h
    stb/stb_vorbis.h
)

# Create a dummy source file to create the static library
file(WRITE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dummy_stb.c "")

# Add STB library as a static library
add_library(STB STATIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dummy_stb.c)

# Set include directories for STB
target_include_directories(STB PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stb)
